name: Super Denrée: Oxian Hero
description:
Super Denrée: Oxian Hero is a game based upon a famous French comedy from the 80's !

You have to help Denrée, a saucer pilot from planet Oxo, avoiding multiple traps and obstacles through the Oxian Training Conduct ! Survive as far as you can and rank up the grades of the Oxian Army !

There's over 30 randomly generated elements for a unique challenge each game !
